translations: 使（正式）开始，使发生；唆使，煽动（instigate sb. to/to do sth.）

sentences.sentence: He did not instigate the coup or even know of it beforehand.
sentences.translation: 他没有发起政变，甚至事先都不知道。

sentences.sentence: Together they should demand, and instigate, a restructuring of Greek debt.
sentences.translation: 他们应当一起要求、鼓动希腊债务重组。

sentences.sentence: Residents, for their part, will be able to instigate local referendums on any local issue.
sentences.translation: 居民将能够就当地任何重要议题进行地方公投。
